citations.narrative:
A current record of hamsters and gerbils on hand was not available except for weekly weanling counts. The record of
animal deaths was not updated since October of 2023. Failure to maintain records on the number of adult hamsters and
gerbils, the number of animals born, or died makes it difficult to assess the health of the colony by identifying animal
losses by decreased number of animals born or raised. Licensee must maintain records containing the required
information for animals which discloses the number of hamsters and gerbils held, born, acquired, or disposed of including
births and deaths. Correct by April 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of hamsters and gerbils on hand was not available except for weekly weanling counts. The record of 
animal deaths was not updated since October of 2023. Failure to maintain records on the number of adult hamsters and 
gerbils, the number of animals born, or died makes it difficult to assess the health of the colony by identifying animal 
losses by decreased number of animals born or raised. Licensee must maintain records containing the required 
information for animals which discloses the number of hamsters and gerbils held, born, acquired, or disposed of including 
births and deaths. Correct by April 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
